solution_line_template: She takes {time_per_question} minutes to answer a question because {minutes_used} / {questions_answered} = <<{minutes_used}/{questions_answered}={time_per_question}>>{time_per_question}
It will take her {total_time_needed} minutes to take the entire exam because {total_questions} x {time_per_question} = <<{total_questions}*{time_per_question}={total_time_needed}>>{total_time_needed}
She has {minutes_left} minutes left when she is done because {allotted_time_in_minutes} - {total_time_needed} = <<{allotted_time_in_minutes}-{total_time_needed}={minutes_left}>>{minutes_left}
